DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The aim study assess impact educational program Narrative Medicine `` workshop reading diary '' dedicate medical student empathy . Design : Randomized Controlled Trial 2 arm . Participants : Medical student ( 4th year ) University Paris Descartes . Methods : participant randomize 2 group . The allocation participant do computerized randomization list , sequence create independent statistician . Participants blind study hypothesis . Allocation concealment provide statistician access randomization list . A program Narrative Medicine lesson small group `` workshop reading patient ' diary `` v `` workshop reading literature '' . Outcome : The primary endpoint first measure empathy medical student . The secondary endpoint second measure empathy medical student ; satisfaction student relative educational program . Potential interest : We believe workshop `` read patient ' diary '' develop think student respect behavior patient , relation student patient . Sample size expect : 200 participant .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Narrative Medicine ( Workshop Reading Diaries )
DOC.criteria: All student fourth year medical refuse participate
